Get data on teams

Source: R/teams.R
fpl_get_teams.Rd

Retrieve data on teams in the current FPL season, obtained via the teams endpoint.

fpl_get_teams()

Value

a tibble

Examples

fpl_get_teams()
#> # A tibble: 20 x 23
#>       id current_event_f… next_event_fixt… name   code short_name unavailable
